data.comment: The first-half is in progress. Anderlecht get the game underway.
Zulte's Ibrahima Seck scores with his head to give his side a 1-0 lead.
In the minute 30, Michael Murillo (Anderlecht) has received a yellow card from Jan Boterberg.
Goal! Lukas Nmecha levels the match at 1-1.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half has commenced. Zulte with the kick-off.
Francis Amuzu is replacing Mustapha Bundu for the away team.
Goal! Albert Sambi Lokonga gives Anderlecht a 1-2 lead in Waregem.
In the minute 66, Anderlecht make their second substitution with Dauda Mohammed replacing Paul Mukairu.
Jean-Luc Dompe is replacing Bassem Srarfi for Zulte at Regenboogstadion.
Gianni Bruno grabs a goal to bring things level at 2-2 at Regenboogstadion.
In the minute 83, Jelle Vossen is on a sub for Gianni Bruno for Zulte.
Francis Amuzu (Anderlecht) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
It's 2-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
